entry.title: New release for Postiz: Handle error notifications better + Add post checking for draft on the API
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Better error messages by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/861 Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.61.3...v1.62.0

entry.title: New release for Postiz: TikTok failing on post pictures + handle more errors for facebook and instagram
entry.content:
• TikTok has some unusual behavior. If we use a photo slide, the title is reduced from 2000 characters to 90, and a new field is presented: description, which can get up to 4000 characters.
  • Facebook can have restrictions on posting comments, and a proper error message added.
  • Instagram is tricky; it can give you a (401) error, which is a refresh token needed, but basically, they refer to "User is performing too many actions". If we receive a 401, we automatically attempt to refresh the token and retry the request. This causes an infinite loop until the API is exhausted and the action for the day is depleted

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.62.0...v1.62.1
